001package org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.impl;
002
003import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
004import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
005import org.biopax.ols.TermRelationship;
006import org.biopax.ols.TermSynonym;
007import org.biopax.ols.impl.BaseOBO2AbstractLoader;
008import org.biopax.ols.impl.OBO2FormatParser;
009import org.biopax.ols.impl.TermBean;
010import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyAccess;
011import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyTermI;
012
013import java.io.*;
014import java.net.URL;
015import java.nio.file.Files;
016import java.nio.file.Path;
017import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
018import java.util.*;
019
020/**
021 * Wrapper class that hides the way OLS handles OBO files.
022 *
023 * @author Samuorg.biopax.validator.*el Kerrien
024 * @version $Id: OboLoader.java 656 2007-06-29 11:18:19 +0100 (Fri, 29 Jun 2007) skerrien $
025 * @since <pre>30-Sep-2005</pre>
026 */
027public class OboLoader extends BaseOBO2AbstractLoader {
028    public static final Log log = LogFactory.getLog( OboLoader.class );
029
030    public OboLoader( ) {
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * Parse the given OBO file and build a representation of the DAG into an IntactOntology.
035     *
036     * @param file the input file (has to exist and be readable)
037     * @return a non null IntactOntology.
038     */
039    public OntologyAccess parseOboFile( File file, String ontologyID) {
040
041        if ( !file.exists() ) {
042            throw new IllegalArgumentException( file.getAbsolutePath() + " doesn't exist." );
043        }
044
045        if ( !file.canRead() ) {
046            throw new IllegalArgumentException( file.getAbsolutePath() + " could not be read." );
047        }
048
049        try {
050            setParser(new OBO2FormatParser(file.getAbsolutePath()));
051            process();
052        } catch ( Exception e ) {
053            log.fatal("Parse failed", e);
054        }
055        return buildOntology(ontologyID);
056    }
057
058
059    /**
060     * Load an OBO data from URL (uses a temporary local file).
061     * Can read from a https:, file:, jar:file: (classpath) URL.
062     *
063     * @param url of the resource to load (not null)
064     * @return ontology access object
065     * @see #parseOboFile(File, String)
066     */
067    public OntologyAccess parseOboFile(URL url, String ontologyID ) throws Exception {
068        if ( url == null ) {
069            throw new IllegalArgumentException( "URL is null" );
070        }
071        log.info( "Loading OBO data from URI: " + url );
072        try {
073            Path tmp = Files.createTempFile(ontologyID + "_", ".obo");
074            tmp.toFile().deleteOnExit();
075            log.info("Using a temporary OBO file: " + tmp);
076            Files.copy(url.openStream(), tmp, StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
077            // process the temporary OBO file
078            return parseOboFile(tmp.toFile(), ontologyID);
079        } catch ( IOException e ) {
080            throw new OntologyLoaderException( "Failed to parse OBO data from URI", e );
081        }
082    }
083
084
085    private OntologyAccess buildOntology(String ontologyID) {
086
087        OntologyAccess ontologyAccess = new OntologyAccessImpl();
088
089        // 1. convert and index all terms (note: at this stage we don't handle the hierarchy)
090        for ( Iterator iterator = ontBean.getTerms().iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); ) {
091            TermBean term = ( TermBean ) iterator.next();
092
093            /*
094             * Quick workaround for that
095             * we want to ignore the PSI-MOD terms that are included into PSI-MI files!
096             */
097            if("PSI-MOD".equals(term.getNamespace()) 
098                        && ("PSI-MI".equals(ontologyID) || "MI".equals(ontologyID)))
099                continue; // skip
100            
101            // convert term into a OboTerm
102            OntologyTermI ontologyTerm = new OntologyTermImpl(ontologyID, term.getIdentifier(), term.getName());
103            
104            final Collection<TermSynonym> synonyms = term.getSynonyms();
105            if( synonyms != null ) {
106                for ( TermSynonym synonym : synonyms ) {
107                    ontologyTerm.getNameSynonyms().add( synonym.getSynonym() );
108                }
109            }
110
111            ontologyAccess.addTerm( ontologyTerm );
112
113            if ( term.isObsolete() ) {
114                ontologyAccess.addObsoleteTerm( ontologyTerm );
115            }
116        }
117
118        // 2. build hierarchy based on the relations of the Terms
119        for ( Iterator iterator = ontBean.getTerms().iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); )
120        {
121            TermBean term = ( TermBean ) iterator.next();
122            // a quick workaround an issue that we want to ignore PSI-MOD included in PSI-MI
123            if("PSI-MOD".equals(term.getNamespace()) && ("PSI-MI".equals(ontologyID) || "MI".equals(ontologyID)))
124                continue; // skip
125
126            if ( term.getRelationships() != null ) {
127                for ( Iterator iterator1 = term.getRelationships().iterator(); iterator1.hasNext(); ) {
128                    TermRelationship relation = ( TermRelationship ) iterator1.next();
129                    // to ignore PSI-MOD included in PSI-MI, simply to check for NPE -
130                    try {
131                        ontologyAccess.addLink( relation.getObjectTerm().getIdentifier(),
132                          relation.getSubjectTerm().getIdentifier() );
133                    } catch (NullPointerException e) {
134                        log.warn("Skipping terms relationship " + relation + "; " + e);
135                    }
136                }
137            }
138        }
139
140        return ontologyAccess;
141    }
142}
